Installation Instruction¶

Contents:

Dependencies¶

  • Ubuntu dependencies
  • Python dependencies
  • Setting up the environment
  • Enough disk space

Project configuration and setup¶

Steps to do before executing the pipeline

  1. Create the folder structure of your project.
  2. Copy the DICOM / MPRAGE (T1, T2) images in the corresponding folders
  3. Run the Connectome Mapping Toolkit Configuration GUI
